data.title: Personal & Business Banking in Austin, Texas
data.text:
HORIZON BANK

Born, raised, and invested in Texas.

We're from here. Since 1905, Horizon has been proud to work with local businesses across central Texas and beyond.

Texas-sized security.

Your information’s security is our top concern. That’s why we invest in the latest technology to ensure your data is secure and you have ultimate peace of mind.

To learn more about best security practices and the steps you can take, visit our Fraud Prevention Page.

Our security features include:

Fraud software analytics

We use sophisticated software that reviews user behavior and transaction risks to help proactively identify and stop suspicious activity.

Positive Pay

This optional service, designed for customers who issue many checks, creates a list of approved payments that is used to compare and verify each item presented for payment.

IP reputation tools

Our systems help block access to or from potentially dangerous websites and other malicious actions.

The new Horizon Bank is here.

Our brand-new, state-of-the-art downtown Austin branch is now open!

Please come see us at 600 West 5th Street.

Howdy, partner.

Banking is a business of people, not decimal points. That’s why we go way beyond a first-name basis to form personal relationships. Every one of our bankers is committed to their customers’ needs, lives, and goals for the long haul. Read More

We go the extra mile. But first, we pave the road.

From laying your financial foundation to building your business, you’d be hard-pressed to find another bank that offers what we do. Read More
